channel.title: Cache help please!
channel.description:
Okay I'm having a problem. For Character Rights 2 and 3 They both have the same crown. I want to make it so character rights 3 has the red crown and character rights 2 has the yellow crown. HELP PLOX
[img]http://gyazo.com/0a962e3deda1de63f5e5f8c65c0f9759.png[/img]

item.title: Cache help please!
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

Did you try looking for tutorials on this first? Also, just replacing what is there usually doesn’t work. You need a cache editor.

Read full topic
